Texts.Eng: Got your Wyvern license. I'm giving up on caring where you keep getting these... ^green;we can upgrade your ship now. If you bring me ^orange;16 upgrade modules ^green;I'll initiate the upgrade.
I see you got your Eagle license! ^green;Now we can upgrade your ship. If you bring me ^orange;8 upgrade modules ^green;I'll initiate the upgrade procedure.
The upgrade is complete. Enjoy your new home. ^green;I suspect more people will be asking you for help now that you have a bigger ship.
What? ^green;Did you forget where the blackmarket is?
